entry.title: æ·±å…¥å­¦ä¹ Reactç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°
entry.content:
å·¥ä½œä¸­ç®€å•ä½¿ç”¨äº†ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°å·²ç»æ— æ³•æ»¡è¶³æˆ‘äº†ã€‚æƒ³è¦æ·±å…¥åœ°äº†è§£ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°ï¼Œå¹¶äº†è§£åœ¨ç‰ˆæœ¬å‡çº§çš„å˜åŒ–åŸå› ...

æ¦‚è§ˆ

ç»„ä»¶çš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºä¸‰ä¸ªé˜¶æ®µï¼š Mountingã€Updatingã€Unmounting

Mountingé˜¶æ®µçš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°

  • constructor(props)
  • (static)getÂ­DerivedÂ­StateÂ­FromÂ­Props(props, state)
  • render()
  • componentDidMount()
  • UNSAFE_componentWillMount()

Updatingé˜¶æ®µçš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°

  • (static)getDerivedStateFromProps(props, state)
  • shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState)
  • render()
  • getSnapshotBeforeUpdate(prevProps, prevState)
  • componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot)
  • UNSAFE_componentWillUpdate()
  • UNSAFE_componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps, nextState)

Unmountingé˜¶æ®µçš„ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸå‡½æ•°

  • componentWillUnmount()

Error Handling

  • (static)getDerivedStateFromError()
  • componentDidCatch()

ç»†èŠ‚

constructor(props)

  • å¦‚æœä½ ä¸éœ€è¦å±€éƒ¨stateæˆ–è€…ç»‘å®šå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å®ç°ï¼ˆimplementï¼‰å®ƒ
  • åº”è¯¥é¦–å…ˆsuper(props)ï¼Œå¦åˆ™this.propså°†ä¸ºundefinedï¼Œå¯¼è‡´bugï¼ˆè°ƒç”¨äº†superåï¼Œå¦‚æœæ²¡æœ‰propsï¼Œthis.propsä¸º{} ï¼‰
  • ä¸åº”è¯¥åœ¨è¿™é‡ŒsetStateï¼ˆReactV16.11æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œè¿™æ ·åšä¼šæŠ¥é”™ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”å¹¶ä¸ä¼šç”Ÿæ•ˆï¼‰
  • Avoid copying props into state! Only use this pattern if you intentionally want to ignore prop updates. ä¸è¦ç”¨propsåˆå§‹åŒ–stateï¼Œé™¤éä½ ç‰¹æ„æƒ³è¦å¿½ç•¥propsçš„æ›´æ–°

render()

  • åœ¨shouldComponentUpdate()è¿”å›falseæ—¶ä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œ

åœ¨shouldComponentUpdate(nextProps, nextState)

  • ğŸ¤”ï¸åœ¨åˆå§‹åŒ–å’Œè°ƒç”¨forceState()æ—¶ä¸ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨
  • ä¸è¦ä¾èµ–å®ƒæ¥â€œé˜»æ­¢â€æ¸²æŸ“ï¼Œå› ä¸ºè¿™ä¼šå¯¼è‡´Bugã€‚è€ƒè™‘ä½¿ç”¨å†…ç½®çš„PureComponentï¼Œè€Œä¸æ˜¯æ‰‹å·¥ç¼–å†™shouldComponentUpdate()ã€‚PureComponentå¯¹propså’Œstateè¿›è¡Œäº†æµ…å±‚æ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå‡å°‘äº†æ‚¨è·³è¿‡å¿…è¦æ›´æ–°çš„å¯èƒ½æ€§
  • è¿”å›falseä¸ä¼šé˜»æ­¢å­ç»„ä»¶ç”±äºä»–ä»¬çš„stateæ”¹å˜é‡æ–°render(Note that returning false does not prevent child components from re-rendering when their state changes.)
  • åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè¿›è¡Œæ·±å±‚æ¬¡çš„æ£€æŸ¥å¦‚JSON.stringify()æ˜¯å¾ˆæµªè´¹æ€§èƒ½çš„
  • å½“å‰ï¼Œå¦‚æœshouldComponentUpdate()è¿”å›falseï¼Œåˆ™ä¸ä¼šè°ƒç”¨unsafe_ComponentWillUpdate()ã€render()å’ŒComponentDidUpdate()ã€‚
    åœ¨å°†æ¥ï¼ŒReactå¯èƒ½ä¼šå°†shouldComponentUpdate()è§†ä¸ºæç¤ºè€Œä¸æ˜¯ä¸¥æ ¼çš„æŒ‡ä»¤ï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”è¿”å›falseä»ç„¶å¯èƒ½å¯¼è‡´é‡æ–°å‘ˆç°ç»„ä»¶ã€‚ (why ???)

ä¸è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œä»¥åŠè¿”å›nullç­‰å€¼ä¼šå¦‚ä½•ï¼Ÿ
ç­”ï¼šä¸è¿”å›å€¼ä¼šæŠ¥é”™æç¤º: shouldComponentUpdate(): Returned undefined instead of a boolean value. Make sure to return true or false. è¿”å›nullè¢«è®¤ä¸ºæ˜¯false
ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆä»è¾“å‡ºçœ‹ï¼ŒnextStateå·²ç»è¢«æ”¹å˜äº†ï¼Ÿ
ç­”ï¼šæ˜¯çš„ã€‚setStateä¸€å®šä¼šæ”¹å˜stateï¼Œä½†æ˜¯ä¸ä¸€å®šå¼•èµ·é‡æ–°renderï¼Œè¿™é‡Œè¦æ³¨æ„shouldComponentUpdateå¹¶ä¸æ˜¯çœŸçš„é˜»æ­¢äº†setStateï¼ˆæˆ‘ä¹‹å‰ç†è§£é”™è¯¯ï¼‰

componentDidMount()

  • åœ¨è¿™é‡Œç»‘å®šäº‹ä»¶å¤„ç†ç¨‹åºæ˜¯æ¯”è¾ƒå¥½çš„
  • åœ¨è¿™é‡Œè®¿é—®æ¥å£ä¹Ÿå¾ˆåˆé€‚

getSnapshotBeforeUpdate(prevProps, prevState)

  • ä»»ä½•è¿”å›å€¼éƒ½ä¼šè¢«ä¼ é€’ç»™componentDidUpdate

static getDerivedStateFromError(error)

  • åœ¨"render"é˜¶æ®µæ•è·é”™è¯¯
  • åªèƒ½æ•è·å­ç»„ä»¶çš„é”™è¯¯

componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot)

  • é¦–æ¬¡renderä¹‹åä¸ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œ
  • æ“ä½œdomçš„åˆé€‚æ—¶æœº
  • åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥è®¾è®¡æ¡ä»¶æ¥é‡æ–°è¯·æ±‚æ¥å£
  • åœ¨è¿™é‡Œå¯ä»¥setStateï¼Œä½†æ˜¯è¦æ³¨æ„ä¸è¦é€ æˆæ— é™å¾ªç¯
  • getSnapshotBeforeUpdate()ä¼šä¸ºcomponentDidUpdateä¼ é€’snapshotå‚æ•°ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ä¸ºundefined

UNSAFE_componentWillReceiveProps(nextProps, nextState)

  • ä¸å®‰å…¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ¨èä½¿ç”¨æ–°Apiï¼šgetDerivedStateFromProps
  • ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨componentWillReceivePropsä¼šæç¤ºWarning
  • åœ¨Reavt V17 componentWillReceivePropså°†ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨
  • å’ŒgetDerivedStateFromPropsæ–¹æ³•ä¸èƒ½åŒæ—¶å­˜åœ¨
  • å’ŒgetDerivedStateFromPropsåŒºåˆ«1: ç»„ä»¶ç›´æ¥æ¸²æŸ“å’Œå­ç»„ä»¶ç›´æ¥æ¸²æŸ“ä¸ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨
  • å’ŒgetDerivedStateFromPropsåŒºåˆ«1: æ— è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œåè€…è¿”å›state

getDerivedStateFromProps()

  • è§¦å‘æ—¶æœºå¾ˆå¤šï¼š constructor()ä¹‹åã€æ¥æ”¶åˆ° "new" propsã€ setState()ä¹‹åã€ forceState()ä¹‹å
  • å®ƒå­˜åœ¨åªä¸ºäº†ä¸€ä¸ªç›®çš„ï¼Œæä¾›äº†ä»çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶propsçš„æ”¹å˜æ¥æ›´æ–°å­ç»„ä»¶å†…éƒ¨stateçš„åŠŸèƒ½ï¼ˆgetDerivedStateFromProps exists for only one purpose. It enables a component to update its internal state as the result of changes in props.ï¼‰
  • æ´¾ç”ŸçŠ¶æ€åº”è¯¥è°¨æ…ä½¿ç”¨ã€‚æˆ‘ä»¬çœ‹åˆ°çš„æ‰€æœ‰æ´¾ç”Ÿstateçš„é—®é¢˜æœ€ç»ˆéƒ½å¯ä»¥å½’ç»“ä¸º(1)æ— æ¡ä»¶åœ°ä»propsæ›´æ–°state (2)æ¯å½“propså’Œstateä¸åŒ¹é…æ—¶æ›´æ–°state

For a long time, the lifecycle componentWillReceiveProps was the only way to update state in response to a change in props without an additional render. In version 16.3, we introduced a replacement lifecycle, getDerivedStateFromProps to solve the same use cases in a safer way.
React 16.4 included a bugfix for getDerivedStateFromProps which caused some existing bugs in React components to reproduce more consistently.
The getDerivedStateFromProps bugfix in 16.4 makes derived state more predictable.

ä¸€ä¸ªå¸¸è§çš„é”™è¯¯è§‚å¿µå°±æ˜¯getDerivedStateFromPropså’ŒgetDerivedStateFromPropsä»…åœ¨propsæ”¹å˜æ—¶è¢«è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œå®é™…ä¸Šåœ¨çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶é‡æ–°renderæ—¶å®ƒä»¬å°±ä¼šè¢«è°ƒç”¨ï¼Œè€Œä¸ç®¡ä¹‹å‰çš„å’Œç°åœ¨çš„propsæœ‰æ²¡æœ‰å·®å¼‚ã€‚ï¼ˆA common misconception is that getDerivedStateFromProps and componentWillReceiveProps are only called when props â€œchangeâ€. These lifecycles are called any time a parent component rerenders, regardless of whether the props are â€œdifferentâ€ from before.ï¼‰

ç–‘é—®åˆ—è¡¨

getDerivedStateFromProps() is defined as an instance method and will be ignored. Instead, declare it as a static method.

entry.title: React ToDoé¡¹ç›®
entry.content:
ç»å…¸çš„ToDoåˆ—è¡¨é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œè‡ªå·±æŒ‰ç…§ç½‘ä¸Šçš„æ•ˆæœå®ç°ä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œè®¤çœŸå®Œæˆã€‚

éœ€æ±‚åˆ†æ

  • è‡³å°‘æœ‰ä¸€æ¡todoæ—¶ï¼Œè¾“å…¥æ å‰å­˜åœ¨æŒ‰é’®ï¼Œç‚¹å‡»å¯ä»¥è®¾ç½®æ‰€æœ‰itemä¸º
  • è‡³å°‘æœ‰ä¸€æ¡todoæ—¶ï¼Œä¸‹æ–¹å‡ºç°çŠ¶æ€ç­›é€‰
  • è‡³å°‘æœ‰ä¸€æ¡å®Œæˆçš„todoæ—¶ï¼ŒçŠ¶æ€ç­›é€‰æ å³ä¾§å‡ºç°æ¸…é™¤å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆ

æ•°æ®

state(çŠ¶æ€): [All, Active, Completed]

åŸºæœ¬åŸå‹ï¼ˆçœŸé¸¡å„¿ä¸‘)ï¼š

æ ·å¼éš¾ç‚¹ï¼š

åŠŸèƒ½éš¾ç‚¹ï¼š

é‡æ„

æœ¬é˜¶æ®µJSX å±•å¼€æŸ¥çœ‹ 
import React from 'react';
import { NavLink, HashRouter } from 'react-router-dom';
import './App.css';

class App extends React.Component {
  constructor(props) {
    super(props);
    this.state = {
      todos: [{
        id: 1,
        text: 'ä½ å¥½',
        isCompleted: false
      }],
      filter: window.location.hash.split("/").pop() || 'All',
      inputText: ''
    };
    this.states = ['All', 'Active', 'Completed'];
  }

  handleDelete = (id) => {
    this.setState({
      todos: this.state.todos.filter(todo => todo.id !== id)
    });
  }

  handleInputKeyDown = (event) => {
    if (event.keyCode === 13) {
      const { todos, inputText } = this.state;
      this.setState({
        todos: [...todos, {
          id: todos.length + 1,
          text: inputText,
          isCompleted: false
        }],
        inputText: ''
      })
    }
  }

  handleToggleState = todo => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    // debugger;
    // let/ newTodo = Object.assign({}, todo); //è¿™é‡Œç–‘ä¼¼ä¿®æ”¹äº†åŸæ•°æ®
    let newTodo = todos.find(v => v === todo);
    newTodo.isCompleted = !newTodo.isCompleted;
    this.setState({
      // todos: Object.assign([], todos,
      // Object.assign(newTodo, { isCompleted: !newTodo.isCompleted }))
      todos
    });
  }

  handleChangeTodoText = todo => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    let newTodo = todos.find(v => v === todo);
    newTodo.isEditing = true;
    this.setState({
      todos
    });
  }

  refreshTodos = () => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    // å¯ä»¥è€ƒè™‘ä»…ä¿®æ”¹ä¸€é¡¹
    this.setState({
      todos: todos.map(todo => Object.assign({}, todo, { isEditing: false }))
    });
  }

  handleCompleteAll = () => {
    const { todos } = this.state;
    this.setState({
      todos: todos.map(todo => Object.assign({}, todo, { isCompleted: true }))
    });
  }

  render() {
    const { inputText, todos, filter } = this.state;
    return (
      <div className="App" >
        <HashRouter>
          <header className="App-header">
            <h1>todos</h1>
            <div className="header">
              {todos.filter(todo => todo.isCompleted === filter || filter === "All").length > 0 && <button onClick={this.handleCompleteAll}>å…¨éƒ¨å®Œæˆ</button>}
              <input
                className="inputText"
                value={inputText}
                placeholder="What need to be done ï¼Ÿ"
                onChange={e => this.setState({ inputText: e.target.value })}
                onKeyDown={this.handleInputKeyDown}
              />
            </div>
            {todos.length > 0 && (
              <React.Fragment>
                <ul className="todos">
                  {todos.filter(todo => (filter === "Active" && !todo.isCompleted) || (filter === "Completed" && todo.isCompleted) || filter === "All").map((todo) => {
                    return (
                      <li key={todo.id} className="todo">
                        <input
                          type="checkbox"
                          checked={todo.isCompleted}
                          onChange={() => this.handleToggleState(todo)}
                        />
                        <p
                          className={todo.isCompleted ? "completed" : ""}
                          onDoubleClick={() => this.handleChangeTodoText(todo)}
                          onBlur={this.refreshTodos}
                        >
                          {todo.isEditing ? (
                            <input value={todo.text} onChange={e => {
                              const newTodos = [...todos];
                              const newTodo = newTodos.find(v => v === todo);
                              newTodo.text = e.target.value;
                              this.setState({
                                todos: newTodos
                              })
                            }} />
                          ) : todo.text}
                        </p>
                        <button className="delete" onClick={() => this.handleDelete(todo.id)}></button>
                      </li>
                    )
                  })}
                </ul>
              </React.Fragment>
            )}
            {todos.length > 0 && (
              <div className="bar">
                <span>{todos.length} items left</span>
                <div>
                  {this.states.map(state => (
                    <NavLink
                      to={state}
                      key={state}
                      className="state"
                      onClick={() => this.setState({ filter: state })}
                    // activeClassName="active"
                    >
                      {state}
                    </NavLink>
                  ))}
                </div>
                <div></div>
              </div>
            )}
          </header>
        </HashRouter>
      </div>
    );
  }
}

export default App;
æœ¬é˜¶æ®µCSS å±•å¼€æŸ¥çœ‹ 
.App {
  width: 600px;
  margin: auto;
  text-align: center;
}

.App-header {
  min-height: 100vh;
  font-size: calc(10px + 2vmin);
}

.header,
.bar {
  display: flex;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  padding: 8px;
}

.header input {
  flex: 1;
  border: none;
  outline: none;
  margin-left: 8px;
}

.todos {
  margin: 0;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  padding: 0;
}

.todo {
  position: relative;
  padding: 8px;
}

.todo input[type="checkbox"] {
  zoom: 2;
  -webkit-appearance: none;
}

.todo p {
  background-position: center left;
  background-repeat: no-repeat;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 10px 0 10px 50px;
  flex: 1;
  text-align: left;
}

.todo p {
  background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width%3D%2240%22%20height%3D%2240%22%20viewBox%3D%22-10%20-18%20100%20135%22%3E%3Ccircle%20cx%3D%2250%22%20cy%3D%2250%22%20r%3D%2250%22%20fill%3D%22none%22%20stroke%3D%22%23ededed%22%20stroke-width%3D%223%22/%3E%3C/svg%3E')
}

.todo p.completed {
  background-image: url('data:image/svg+xml;utf8,%3Csvg%20xmlns%3D%22http%3A//www.w3.org/2000/svg%22%20width%3D%2240%22%20height%3D%2240%22%20viewBox%3D%22-10%20-18%20100%20135%22%3E%3Ccircle%20cx%3D%2250%22%20cy%3D%2250%22%20r%3D%2250%22%20fill%3D%22none%22%20stroke%3D%22%23bddad5%22%20stroke-width%3D%223%22/%3E%3Cpath%20fill%3D%22%235dc2af%22%20d%3D%22M72%2025L42%2071%2027%2056l-4%204%2020%2020%2034-52z%22/%3E%3C/svg%3E')
}


.todo .delete {
  position: absolute;
  right: 10px;
  top: 10;
  border: none;
  font-size: 36px;
}

.todo .delete::after {
  content: "x";
}

.bar {
  justify-content: space-between;
  position: relative;
}

.bar::after {
  content: "";
  height: 100%;
  position: absolute;
  left: 0;
  right: 0;
  bottom: 0;
  height: 44px;
  box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 8px 0 -3px #f6f6f6, 0 9px 1px -3px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2), 0 16px 0 -6px #f6f6f6, 0 17px 2px -6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);
}

.bar .state {
  color: inherit;
  text-decoration-line: none;
  margin: 0 8px;
  padding: 3px 7px;
}

.state.active {
  border: 1px solid #a00;
}

.todo {
  display: flex;
  align-items: center;
}

å¯ä»¥åˆ†ä¸ºFormã€Todosã€Filtersä¸‰éƒ¨åˆ†:

Form

è¯¥ç»„ä»¶æ‹¥æœ‰è‡ªå·±çš„å±€éƒ¨çŠ¶æ€inputTextï¼Œä¸éœ€è¦å…³å¿ƒtodoåˆ—è¡¨

Todos

è¯¥ç»„ä»¶éœ€è¦çˆ¶ç»„ä»¶ä¼ todosã€ä¿®æ”¹todoä¿¡æ¯çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä»¥åŠonBlurå°†æ‰€æœ‰todoçš„isEditingè®¾ç½®ä¸ºfalseã€åˆ é™¤todoé¡¹çš„å›è°ƒå‡½æ•°

Todo

å…¶å®ä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä¸æ‹†

entry.title: åˆå­¦Vueçš„ç–‘æƒ‘è®°å½•
entry.content:
•   <input v-bind:value="msg" />  // ä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¿™æ ·ä¿®æ”¹ä¸ä¼šå¯¼è‡´vueçš„dataå˜åŒ–ï¼Ÿ  
  <input v-model="msg" />
  • ä¸è®¾ç½®vueçš„el
  • è®¡ç®—å±æ€§å®é™…ä¸Šæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå‡½æ•°ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯åœ¨ç›´æ¥è¾“å‡ºæ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚ console.log(vue.reverseMessage); æ˜¾ç¤ºçš„æ˜¯è°ƒç”¨çš„ç»“æœï¼Œå¹¶ä¸”åœ¨htmlæ¨¡ç‰ˆä¸­ä¹Ÿæ˜¯è¿™æ ·çš„æ•ˆæœï¼Œwhy ï¼Ÿ
    ç­”ï¼š å®˜ç½‘æåˆ°äº†ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬æä¾›çš„å‡½æ•°å°†ç”¨ä½œå±æ€§ vm.reserveMessage çš„getterå‡½æ•°

entry.title: 7-24 çŒœæ•°å­—æ¸¸æˆ
entry.content:
é¢˜ç›®è¦æ±‚ï¼š

çŒœæ•°å­—æ¸¸æˆæ˜¯ä»¤æ¸¸æˆæœºéšæœºäº§ç”Ÿä¸€ä¸ª100ä»¥å†…çš„æ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ•°å¯¹å…¶è¿›è¡ŒçŒœæµ‹ï¼Œéœ€è¦ä½ ç¼–å†™ç¨‹åºè‡ªåŠ¨å¯¹å…¶ä¸éšæœºäº§ç”Ÿçš„è¢«çŒœæ•°è¿›è¡Œæ¯”è¾ƒï¼Œå¹¶æç¤ºå¤§äº†ï¼ˆâ€œToo bigâ€ï¼‰ï¼Œè¿˜æ˜¯å°äº†ï¼ˆâ€œToo smallâ€ï¼‰ï¼Œç›¸ç­‰è¡¨ç¤ºçŒœåˆ°äº†ã€‚å¦‚æœçŒœåˆ°ï¼Œåˆ™ç»“æŸç¨‹åºã€‚ç¨‹åºè¿˜è¦æ±‚ç»Ÿè®¡çŒœçš„æ¬¡æ•°ï¼Œå¦‚æœ1æ¬¡çŒœå‡ºè¯¥æ•°ï¼Œæç¤ºâ€œBingo!â€ï¼›å¦‚æœ3æ¬¡ä»¥å†…çŒœåˆ°è¯¥æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æç¤ºâ€œLucky You!â€ï¼›å¦‚æœè¶…è¿‡3æ¬¡ä½†æ˜¯åœ¨Nï¼ˆ>3ï¼‰æ¬¡ä»¥å†…ï¼ˆåŒ…æ‹¬ç¬¬Næ¬¡ï¼‰çŒœåˆ°è¯¥æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™æç¤ºâ€œGood Guess!â€ï¼›å¦‚æœè¶…è¿‡Næ¬¡éƒ½æ²¡æœ‰çŒœåˆ°ï¼Œåˆ™æç¤ºâ€œGame Overâ€ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“æŸç¨‹åºã€‚å¦‚æœåœ¨åˆ°è¾¾Næ¬¡ä¹‹å‰ï¼Œç”¨æˆ·è¾“å…¥äº†ä¸€ä¸ªè´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œä¹Ÿè¾“å‡ºâ€œGame Overâ€ï¼Œå¹¶ç»“æŸç¨‹åºã€‚

è¾“å…¥æ ¼å¼:
è¾“å…¥ç¬¬ä¸€è¡Œä¸­ç»™å‡ºä¸¤ä¸ªä¸è¶…è¿‡100çš„æ­£æ•´æ•°ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯æ¸¸æˆæœºäº§ç”Ÿçš„éšæœºæ•°ã€ä»¥åŠçŒœæµ‹çš„æœ€å¤§æ¬¡æ•°Nã€‚æœ€åæ¯è¡Œç»™å‡ºä¸€ä¸ªç”¨æˆ·çš„è¾“å…¥ï¼Œç›´åˆ°å‡ºç°è´Ÿæ•°ä¸ºæ­¢ã€‚

è¾“å‡ºæ ¼å¼:
åœ¨ä¸€è¡Œä¸­è¾“å‡ºæ¯æ¬¡çŒœæµ‹ç›¸åº”çš„ç»“æœï¼Œç›´åˆ°è¾“å‡ºçŒœå¯¹çš„ç»“æœæˆ–â€œGame Overâ€åˆ™ç»“æŸã€‚

è¾“å…¥æ ·ä¾‹:
58 4
70
50

58
60
-2

è¾“å‡ºæ ·ä¾‹:
Too big
Too small
Too small
Good Guess!

æˆ‘çš„é”™è¯¯ä»£ç 

#include<stdio.h>
int main() {
    int num, n;
    scanf("%d%d", &num, &n);
    int input = 0, times = 1;
    do {
    scanf("%d", &input);
    if (input == num) {
        if (times == 1) {
            printf("Bingo!\n");
            return 0;
        } else if (times <= 3) {
            printf("Lucky You!\n");
            return 0;
        } else if (times  <= n) {
            printf("Good Guess!\n");
            return 0;
        } else {
            printf("Game Over\n");
            return 0;
        }
    } else if (num > input) {
        printf("Too small\n");
        times++;
    } else {
        printf("Too big\n");
        times++;
    }
    } while ( input >= 0);
    printf("Game Over\n");
}

æˆ‘çš„ç­”æ¡ˆåœ¨æœ€åä¸€ä¸ªæµ‹è¯•ç‚¹æ€»æ˜¯æç¤ºé”™è¯¯ï¼Œé”™è¯¯åŸå› åœ¨äºdoè‡³å°‘ä¼šæ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡ï¼Œå¦‚æœç¬¬ä¸€æ¬¡è¾“å…¥çš„å€¼å°±æ˜¯è´Ÿæ•°ï¼Œä¼šå…ˆè¾“å‡ºToo smallï¼Œä¹‹åæ‰æ˜¯Game Overã€‚

æ­£ç¡®ä»£ç 

#include <stdio.h>
int main(){
    int count=-1, N=-1;
    int number=-1, guess=-1;
    count = 0;
    scanf("%d%d", &number, &N);
    while(count<N){
        scanf("%d", &guess);
        count++;
        if(guess<0){
            break;
        }
        if(guess==number){
            if(count==1){
                printf("Bingo!\n");
                break;
            }
            else if(count<=3){
                printf("Lucky You!\n");
                break;
            }
            else{
                printf("Good Guess!\n");
                break;
            }
        }
        else if(guess<number){
            printf("Too small\n");
        }
        else{
            printf("Too big\n");
        }
    }
    if(guess<0 || count==N&&guess!=number){
        printf("Game Over\n");
    }

    return 0;
}

entry.content:
è·Ÿç€ã€Šnode.jså®æˆ˜ã€‹å®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªèŠå¤©å®¤

  • ç”¨æˆ·å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨å‘½ä»¤çš„å½¢å¼åˆ›å»ºèŠå¤©å®¤ï¼ˆæˆ–åŠ å…¥ï¼‰
  • èŠå¤©å®¤åæ˜¾ç¤ºä¸ºç½‘é¡µçš„title
  • æ¶ˆæ¯åŒºåŸŸå³ä¾§æœ‰å¯ç”¨æˆ¿é—´åˆ—è¡¨

ä»»åŠ¡åˆ†è§£

  1. æ ·å¼ç¼–å†™
  2. æœåŠ¡ç«¯å¤„ç†èŠå¤©ä¿¡æ¯
  3. æµè§ˆå™¨å¤„ç†èŠå¤©ä¿¡æ¯

éœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°çš„åº“æˆ–æ¨¡å—

  • socket.ioå®ç°WebSocket
  • node-mime

å»ºç«‹é¡¹ç›®åŠå‡†å¤‡å·¥ä½œ

é¡¹ç›®å»ºç«‹å°±ä¸å¤šè¯´äº†ï¼Œé¡¹ç›®ä¸­å»ºç«‹æ–‡ä»¶å¤¹publicï¼Œç”¨æ¥ä¿å­˜é™æ€æ–‡ä»¶ï¼Œå¹¶åœ¨æ ¹ç›®å½•åˆ›å»ºserver.js

ä½¿ç”¨nodeå®ç°ä¸€ä¸ªhttpServer

const http = require('http');
const fs = require('fs');
const path = require('path');
const mime = require('mime');

let cache = {};

function send404(res) {
    res.writeHead(404, {
        'Content-Type': 'text/plain;charset=utf-8'
    });
    res.write('Error 404: èµ„æºæœªæ‰¾åˆ°ï½');
    res.end();
}

function sendFile(res, filePath, fileContent) {
    res.writeHead(200, {
        'Content-Type': mime.lookup(path.basename(filePath))
    });
    res.end(fileContent);
}

function serveStatic(res, cache, absPath) {
    if (cache[absPath]) {
        sendFile(res, absPath, cache[absPath]);
    } else {
        fs.exists(absPath, exists => {
            if (exists) {
                fs.readFile(absPath, (err, data) => {
                    if (err) {
                        send404(res);
                    } else {
                        cache[absPath] = data;
                        sendFile(res, absPath, data);
                    }
                });
            } else {
                send404(res);
            }
        });
    }
}

const server = http.createServer((req, res) => {
    console.log(req.url);
    let filePath = false;
    if (req.url === '/') {
        filePath = 'public/index.html'
    } else {
        filePath = 'public' + req.url;
    }
    const absPath = './' + filePath;
    serveStatic(res, cache, absPath);
});

server.listen(5555, () => {
    console.log('server listening on port 5555');
})

è¿™é‡Œè¦æ³¨æ„ï¼šContent-Typeéœ€è¦åŠ ä¸Šcharset=utf-8æ¥ä¿è¯ä¸­æ–‡ä¸ä¼šä¹±ç 

ä¸­é—´çŠ¯çš„é”™è¯¯

  • absPathé”™è¯¯çš„å†™æˆäº†:

entry.title: ç®—æ³•æœ‰ç©·å‹åˆ†æ hailstoneåºåˆ—
entry.content:
å­¦åˆ°äº†ä¸€ä¸ªçŸ¥è¯†ç‚¹ï¼š

hailstoneåºåˆ—ï¼š
1ï¼‰è¾“å…¥ä¸€ä¸ªæ­£æ•´æ•°nï¼›
ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰å¦‚æœn=1åˆ™ç»“æŸï¼›
ï¼ˆ3ï¼‰å¦‚æœnæ˜¯å¥‡æ•°ï¼Œåˆ™nå˜ä¸º3n+1ï¼Œå¦åˆ™nå˜ä¸ºn/2ï¼›
ï¼ˆ4ï¼‰è½¬å…¥ç¬¬ï¼ˆ2ï¼‰æ­¥ã€‚

function hailstone(n) {
	var length = 1; 
	while(1 < n) {
		if(n % 2 === 0) {
			n = n/2;
		} else {
			n = 3 * n + 1;
		}
		length++;
		
	}
	return length;
}

entry.title: åšå®¢é¡¹ç›®reduceræ‹†åˆ†å’Œä¸­é—´ä»¶
entry.content:
ä»Šå¤©æ”¾å‡ï¼Œç»§ç»­æ’¸åšå®¢é¡¹ç›®ã€‚

æ—©æ™¨å¼€å§‹è‡ªæˆ‘æ€€ç–‘ï¼Œæ˜¯ä¸æ˜¯è¦ç»§ç»­åšä¸‹å»ï¼Œå½“æ—¶è§‰å¾—é¡¹ç›®å¥½åƒæ²¡ä»€ä¹ˆæ„æ€ï¼Œå³ä½¿åšå‡ºæ¥äº†è‡ªå·±çœŸçš„ä¼šå»ç”¨å˜›ï¼Ÿç„¶åå°±å¼€å§‹ç›²ç›®çš„æœç´¢å…¶ä»–æ¥å£ï¼Œæƒ³åšç‚¹åˆ«çš„é¡¹ç›®ï¼Œè¿˜å¥½åŠæ—¶åœæ­¢äº†æœç´¢ï¼Œå»æ‰“æ‰«äº†å¤§åŠä¸ªå°æ—¶çš„å«ç”Ÿï¼Œåˆæ´—äº†å‡ ä»¶è¡£æœï¼Œåƒäº†å¤–å–ï¼Œç¡ä¸€ä¸ªåˆè§‰ã€‚ åº†å¹¸è‡ªå·±è„±ç¦»äº†ç³Ÿç³•çš„çŠ¶æ€ï¼Œå·®ç‚¹æ”¾å¼ƒ~ ä¸è¿‡ä¹Ÿç®—æ˜¯æµªè´¹äº†ä¸Šåˆ+åŠä¸ªä¸‹åˆäº†ã€‚

ä¸»è¦è¿›è¡Œäº†å¦‚ä¸‹å·¥ä½œï¼š

  • é¦–é¡µæ ·å¼å˜æ›´
  • Headerã€Footeræ‹†åˆ†
  • reduceræ‹†åˆ†ï¼Œåˆ†ä¸ºäº†wordã€postå’Œglobal
  • actionä¹Ÿæ‹†å‡ºæ¥äº†
  • ä½¿ç”¨ä¸­é—´ä»¶è¿›è¡Œäº†postsåˆ—è¡¨çš„è·å–

é‡åˆ°çš„é—®é¢˜

åæ€

ç»†èŠ‚ç†è§£ä¸å¤Ÿæ·±åˆ»ï¼Œä¸­é—´ä»¶ä¹Ÿåªæ˜¯copy pasteé˜¶æ®µï¼Œè§‰å¾—è¿™é‡Œåº”è¯¥æ˜¯é«˜é˜¶å‡½æ•°çš„çŸ¥è¯†ä¸æ‡‚ï¼Œå¯¼è‡´çš„æ‡µé€¼ã€‚å¾…è¡¥å…¨ç›¸å…³çŸ¥è¯†ï¼ˆflagï¼‰ã€‚

è®°å½•ä¸´æ—¶ä»£ç 

export function fetchWords() {

    // Thunk middleware çŸ¥é“å¦‚ä½•å¤„ç†å‡½æ•°ã€‚
    // è¿™é‡ŒæŠŠ dispatch æ–¹æ³•é€šè¿‡å‚æ•°çš„å½¢å¼ä¼ ç»™å‡½æ•°ï¼Œ
    // ä»¥æ­¤æ¥è®©å®ƒè‡ªå·±ä¹Ÿèƒ½ dispatch actionã€‚

    return function (dispatch) {

        // é¦–æ¬¡ dispatchï¼šæ›´æ–°åº”ç”¨çš„ state æ¥é€šçŸ¥
        // API è¯·æ±‚å‘èµ·äº†ã€‚

        dispatch(requestWords())

        // thunk middleware è°ƒç”¨çš„å‡½æ•°å¯ä»¥æœ‰è¿”å›å€¼ï¼Œ
        // å®ƒä¼šè¢«å½“ä½œ dispatch æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›å€¼ä¼ é€’ã€‚

        // è¿™ä¸ªæ¡ˆä¾‹ä¸­ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªç­‰å¾…å¤„ç†çš„ promiseã€‚
        // è¿™å¹¶ä¸æ˜¯ redux middleware æ‰€å¿…é¡»çš„ï¼Œä½†è¿™å¯¹äºæˆ‘ä»¬è€Œè¨€å¾ˆæ–¹ä¾¿ã€‚

        return fetch(`http://127.0.0.1:3001/words`)
            .then(function (response) {
                return response.json();
            },
                // ä¸è¦ä½¿ç”¨ catchï¼Œå› ä¸ºä¼šæ•è·
                // åœ¨ dispatch å’Œæ¸²æŸ“ä¸­å‡ºç°çš„ä»»ä½•é”™è¯¯ï¼Œ
                // å¯¼è‡´ 'Unexpected batch number' é”™è¯¯ã€‚
                // https://github.com/facebook/react/issues/6895
                error => console.log('An error occurred.', error)
            )
            .then(json =>
            // å¯ä»¥å¤šæ¬¡ dispatchï¼
            // è¿™é‡Œï¼Œä½¿ç”¨ API è¯·æ±‚ç»“æœæ¥æ›´æ–°åº”ç”¨çš„ stateã€‚
            {
                if (json) {
                    setTimeout(() => {
                        dispatch(receiveWords(json));
                    }, 2000);
                } else {
                    dispatch(fetchError());
                }
            }
            );
    }
}
